title: Checking Mail Server Capabilities
content:
This version is very slow when opened ... it seaches through for various emails (gmail and Outlook) and snags on something called 'Checking Mail Server Capabilities'. Other issues include a slow copy to the Send folder once an email has been sent. I am not a technical person, been using TBird for many years and until now have really enjoyed its capabilities

Is there a known related issue? Overall the performance is very poor ... I use a series 7 processor and have WiFi speeds in excess of 100 MB.

Thanks Ron
creator: RonSH

title: Sending Suspect Spam
content:
Every time I open up Thunderbird email I get a message box which pops up saying " Sending of the Message failed An error occurred when sending mail. Were sorry but we cant send your email. etc, etc and "Please check by sending it again(6-1-1-2) 

ID (68CA1CA0089AF165) please check the message and try again"

How do I find this message ? When I look at sent items in my mail , I have sent nothing and I am not aware of sending anything.
creator: x4tz2bjyrb

title: aggiornamento 146
content: avevo creato una struttura con circa 40 cartelle dove veniva distribuita la posta di ogni singolo account pop3, mediante applicazione di filtri. Dopo aggiornamento a 146, tutte le cartelle locali sono state rinominate nello stesso modo: "Archivi". Ora mi ritrovo con 40 cartelle con lo stesso nome dove andare a cercare la posta arrivata e TB non mi consente di modificare il nome (anche da proprietà), ne di cancellarle. Ho provato con la funzione ripara cartella, anche da modalità offline e risoluzione errore. Esiste un modo per: 1 ripristinare la 145 2 rinominare correttamente le cartelle locali, arbitrariamente modificate da TB In attesa cordialità
creator: ianfer

title: Calendar event context menu has Edit grayed out
content:
Hello,

I accept Teams events over the email, but cannot join them because the Join Meeting hyperlink is removed in the event's description. When I try to edit the event's description manually, the Edit option in the event's context menu (right click) is grayed out as can be seen in the attached picture. I also did not find any other way to change the event's description to insert the Teams meeting URL.

How do I fully edit events, including description and event dates? I need to have calendar events based on Teams meeting invitations work out-of-the-box. How do I achieve this?

Note: Exporting an individual calendar event would also help me solve this problem, but I don't think such a feature exists. If there would be, I would have exported the broken event, correct it manually, delete the old one from Thunderbird, open the event with Thunderbird and then add back the corrected version.

Thank you, Razvan Chisa
creator: ronnyourmatrix

title: Thunderbird for Android sends a copy to myself
content:
If I use Thunderbird for Android to send or answer an e-mail it will be stored in the folder "Sent". That is correct, but I also receive a 100% copy of the e-mail in my Inbox. I cannot find a setting to switch off this behaviour.

Greetings,

Ad Verbunt
creator: ad6
